alert.note: Alert for Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued March 18 at 12:07AM EDT until March 19 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 to 20 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Western Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low temperatures in the single digits coupled with sustained northwest winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph will result in wind chills as low as 15 to 20 below zero, especially along the western facing slopes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
